result.eng: Which route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ga: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua
result.orig: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nua
result.html: Cé acu bealach a roghnófá le haghaidh an líne traenach nuaWhich route would you choose for the new train line?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu bealaċ a roġnófá le haġaiḋ an líne traenaċ nuaWhich route would you choose for the new train line?

result.eng: You can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ga: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.orig: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.html: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat cúnaṁ a ṫaḃairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an daṫ ceart a roġnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
